name: The Cursed Amulet
description:
The Cursed Amulet is an immersive puzzle adventure escape room game.

In this single player game, you play as a curious adventurer who finds themselves trapped in a mysterious cave full of puzzles and hidden secrets. Your mission is to solve the puzzles, unravel the mysteries, and ultimately escape the cave before it's too late.



Puzzles
Challenge your mind with eight unique and exciting puzzles that will keep you engaged and entertained throughout the game.


Mysterious Atmosphere
Immerse yourself in a mysterious and ambient atmosphere that will keep you on the edge of your seat from start to finish.
